name: Crypt of Ammon
description:
Crypt of Ammon

Another University project. This time a 2D plat-former. Where you (the pharaoh) wake up after thounands of years to find yourself locked away in your own temple. It is now time to "get-up" and get to the surface to explore this all new world. Yet you have one problem... Where the **** are your legs??

Year 1 - Fourth Term

Team:

  • Artist: Kayleigh Glaasker (Character Art & Promotional Material)
  • Artist: Liam van Asten (2D Environment Art & Game Design)
  • Artist: Wouter de Vries (Sound Design & 2D Animation)
  • Designer: Tal Aviv (Scrum Master, Game Mechanics & Controller Design)
  • Designer: Yoan Nikolov (Level Design & Website)
  • Engineer: Arjen van Klaveren (Game Flow, Level Manager & Game Interactivity)
  • Engineer: Jenoah Kers (Physics Programmer)
